When I looked up at the Fan Yunyi Statue Record, the water of the Jialing River rushed on. The past years instantly swarmed up, the river struck the stones on the shore, rolling up a thousand waves, like the low roar of the generals, and seemed to be a mournful lamentation, echoing in the ears. Only this statue on Guanyin Rock soothed their hearts. So the river flowed gently into the distance, not so turbulent.
